content:
I liked the new design for the recipients bar, so I would like to have it on my server. How can I do that?
Also, is there anything that I should know? Any problems/bugs/etc.?

There's a branch you can grab. Today's a bit distracting, so remind me if you don't hear anything tomorrow, but basically you want the tabbott/recipient-bar-design branch. There's some tweaks planned, but nothing broken.
Okay. Thanks Tim. Looking forward to it!

Hey @Tim Abbott!
After some time that my Zulip server was unused, it will be used by a larger group of people!! :tada:

About the thing I asked above...
Are there any special things that I need to take into consideration?
I think the main thing to note is that after some experimentation, we've gone back to the original recipient bars, that you see here. So tabbott/recipient-bar-design is no longer maintained.
